narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rehema Behavioral Health Clinic LLC is a Clinical Nurse Specialist, Psych/Mental Health provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $35.6M in Medicaid payments across 15K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $35.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
